my motor never stops running.

i love the rain.

content.text: Hey! I love the rain too! It's so calming.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
Do you have any hobbies?
I love to play music in my spare time. I also like to dye my hair different colors.
That's so cool! I can't sing at all, but I love music.
I'm not a fan of my singing voice either, but I love to play music.
What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different genres, but I mostly play rock and blues.
That's awesome! I love rock music.
Me too! It's so energetic and fun to play.
Do you have any favorite bands?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I love the Beatles too.
They're my favorite band of all time.
Me too! I love their music.
I love their lyrics and their music is so catchy.
Me too! They're amazing.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same music as you.
Yeah, it is! We should definitely hang out sometime and play some music together.
That would be so much fun! I'd love to do that.
Great! We can exchange contact info and plan something.
Sounds good
